name: OctoBall
description:
OctoBall

A very simple game about a man fighting against evil invincible octopi. The object of the game is to get as many points as you can before your hearts run out.

This game was made in a week as the first game in a "one game a week" challenge. My website is http://simplypixelated.com/ and it's where I detail day by day my progress with each game I make, so if you want to check it out, by all means go ahead.
